items.title: Cuyahoga County Deputy Involved in Fatal Chases Accused of ‘Lying’ in Hiring Process
items.description: Deputy Kasey Loudermilk lied and kept details off his application about other police forces disqualifying him, according to his personnel file.

items.title: The Marshall Project Names Jennifer Peter New Editor-in-Chief
items.description: Peter, of The Boston Globe, will lead the national criminal justice outlet’s news operations.

items.title: What Trump’s D.C. Takeover Looks Like on the Ground, Two Weeks On
items.description: Promising to take over police to fight crime, Trump’s effort has instead morphed into mostly an immigration dragnet.

items.title: The Next Alligator Alcatraz Could Be in Your State
items.description: Plans to use Indiana’s “Speedway Slammer,” Louisiana’s Angola and other state prisons to house ICE detainees raise problematic questions, attorneys sa...

items.title: The Heartbreak, Rage — and Discipline — of Immigration Court Watching
items.description: As an observer, Tim Murphy must calmly prepare immigrants to face masked ICE agents. “You’re witnessing unspeakable cruelty, but you can’t lash out.”
